plot: Jazzmin gives the Doodlebops a book of 26 dances A-Z. They decide to have a dance off to see who can do them in order first. Deedee gets a huge head start but does it so fast she tires out and comes in last learning to work steady is best.
title: "The Doodlebops" Step by Step
plot_es: Jazzmin gives the Doodlebops a book of 26 dances A-Z. They decide to have a dance off to see who can do them in order first. Deedee gets a huge head start but does it so fast she tires out and comes in last learning to work steady is best.
plot_en: Jazzmin gives the Doodlebops a book of 26 dances A-Z. They decide to have a dance off to see who can do them in order first. Deedee gets a huge head start but does it so fast she tires out and comes in last learning to work steady is best.
